Key Match Events: Shadab Khan produced a special all-round effort
Shaheen Shah Afridi (3/14) and Shadab (2/16) then blew away the South African top order
South Africa missed the services of their ace batter David Miller who was ruled out due to an injury
Miscellaneous Highlights: With the win, Pakistan (4 points) moved up to the third spot in group 2 While South Africa (5 points) continued to stay second behind leaders India (6 points)
Others: Anrich Nortje was the most successful bowler for South Africa with figures of 4/41
